name: Raccoon Raider and the Temple of Trash
name_original: Raccoon Raider and the Temple of Trash
description:
Play as Archidemes Raccoon on his first archeological adventure! Find trash to send back to the British Museum while evading the ghosts of the previous residents.

This game was created for McGameJam 2023 with the theme "Deserted".
